import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { textInput, textArea } from '../../../shared/form-elements' import { reduxForm, Field } from "redux-form"; function OrganizationForm(props) { const { handleSubmit, onSubmit, status, initialValues, editOrganization } = props useEffect(() => { initialValues({ editOrganization}) console.log(editOrganization) console.log("dddddddddd") console.log("dddddddddd") console.log("dddddddddd") console.log("dddddddddd") }, []); return (
); } OrganizationForm = reduxForm({ form: 'organizationform', enableReinitialize: true, })(OrganizationForm); export default OrganizationForm
